com.skobbler.ngx.map
Class SKAnnotationView

java.lang.Object
  com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKAnnotationView

public class SKAnnotationView
extends java.lang.Object

Class that specifies the source of a bitmap to be rendered with an annotation. The source can be either a view or a a drawable resource (specified with its identified).

Version:
2.3
